name: DTPS Robot Program
summary: An RPG file is a compiled program created by Panasonic Desktop Programming & Simulation (DTPS). It specifies a set of automated actions that a Panasonic welding robot can execute. To use an RPG file with a robot, users must transfer the file to that robot's controller device.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Transfer to and run with compatible Panasonic Welding Robot Controller
